text: Teraemi tomalokaka jala-sthalata bhramana karaaya. Anaki tomaloke yetiya nauyanata araohana karai anukula batahata ananda ullaserae bhramana karaa arau hathat yetiya prabala dhumuha ahe, arau carai'ophalara paraa dhau ahibalai dharae arau sihamte (araohanakaraisakale) niscita dharana karae ye, sihamta paraibestita haiche, tetiya sihamte sarala citte anugatya sahakarae kerala allahake'i praarthana karae ye, â€˜tumi yadi amaka iyara paraa raksa karaa, niscaya ami krtajnasakalara antarbhukta hai yamaâ€™
